jx.jx_en_mean: (of a tree or plant) at the stage of producing fruit
(informal, dated)a friendly form of address used by one man to another
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式，旧)老兄（男人与男人之间的一种友好称呼）

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from Latin fructus 'enjoyment of produce, harvest', from frui 'enjoy', related to fruges 'fruits of the earth', plural (and most common form) of frux, frug- 'fruit'

entry.def: Fruit or a fruit is something which grows on a tree or bush and which contains seeds or a stone covered by a substance that you can eat.

example.ex: Fresh fruit and vegetables provide fibre and vitamins.
example.tran: 新鲜水果和蔬菜提供植物纤维素和维生素。

entry.def: If a plant fruits, it produces fruit.

example.ex: The scientists will study the variety of trees and observe which are fruiting.
example.tran: 科学家将研究各种树木，并观察哪些会结果实。

entry.def: The fruits or the fruit of someone's work or activity are the good things that result from it.

example.ex: The team have really worked hard and Mansell is enjoying the fruits of that labour...
example.tran: 这支队伍真正付出了辛劳，而曼塞尔正在享受着这种辛劳的成果。

example.ex: The findings are the fruit of more than three years research.
example.tran: 这些发现是3年多研究的成果。

entry.tran: 取得成果;奏效;产生好的结果
entry.def: If the effort that you put into something or a particular way of doing something bears fruit, it is successful and produces good results.

example.ex: Eleanor's work among the women will, I trust, bear fruit...
example.tran: 我相信埃莉诺在妇女中所做的工作会见成效的。

example.ex: He was naturally disappointed when the talks failed to bear fruit.
example.tran: 会谈没有取得成果，他自然感到失望。

entry.tran: (项目或活动的)初步成果，最初成效
entry.def: The first fruits or the first fruit of a project or activity are its earliest results or profits.

example.ex: This project is one of the first fruits of commercial co-operation between the two countries.
example.tran: 这个项目是两国商业合作的初步成果之一。

means.word_mean: 1. the ripened reproductive body of a seed plant
2. the consequence of some effort or action;

sentences.sentence: "he lived long enough to see the fruit of his policies"

example.en: a red-faced old gentleman with a fruit salad of medal ribbons on his chest
example.zh: 一位胸前佩戴着奖章、脸色红彤彤的老绅士

Sentence.sentence: They have a broader knowledge of nutrition, so they buy more fresh fruit and vegetables than ever before

Major supermarkets, in meeting consumer expectations, will often reject entire crops of perfectly edible fruit and vegetables at the farm because they do not meet exacting marketing standards for their physical characteristics, such as size and appearance.
Perfectly eatable fruit and vegetable crops often fail to reach supermarkets due to their size or physical appearance
In the Netherlands, Shell delivers CO2 to farmers who pipe it into their greenhouses, increasing their yield of fruits and vegetables.

sentences.en: After years of hard work, his efforts finally bore fruit.
sentences.cn: 经过多年艰苦劳动之后, 他的努力终于取得了成果。

sentences.en: The fruit has spoiled in the hot sun.
The tomato is technically a fruit.
sentences.cn: 从专业上讲, 番茄是一种果实。

jushi.english: She has a pitch on the street where she sells fruit.
jushi.chinese: 她在大街上有一个卖水果的摆摊处。

jushi.english: China produces oranges, peaches, apples and other fruits.
jushi.chinese: 中国生产橘子、桃子、苹果和其他各种水果。

jushi.english: The branches leaned down to the ground, heavy with the weight of the fruit.
jushi.chinese: 累累的果实使枝头垂向地面。
